H0.text: Who directed the film Life of Pi. Ang Lee's contemporary, Wong Kar-wai

H1.text: Who directed the film Life of Pi. The acclaimed director of 'Slumdog Millionaire', Danny Boyle

H2.text: Who directed the film Life of Pi. The veteran director of 'The English Patient', Anthony Minghella

H3.text: Who directed the film Life of Pi. 李安

A4.text: Lee's next film after 2009's Taking Woodstock was Life of Pi

A5.text: Ang Lee won the Academy Award for Best Director for Life of Pi
